title: Sticky soy beef in do-fo ru with garlic mushrooms
time: Takes 15 minutes to make, plus chilling
description: Sticky soy beef in do-fo ru (chilli beancurd flavouring) is delicious, quick and easy to make.
ingredients: 300g piece beef fillet, sliced lengthways into 4 thin slices
4 do-fu ru cubes or tempeh (from oriental supermarkets and health food shops)
Finely sliced spring onions, to garnish

method.Step 1: Season the beef, then rub a cube of do-fu ru or tempeh over each slice. Cover and chill for 20 minutes or overnight.

method.Step 2: Place a wok over a high heat. When hot, add half the oil and all the beef. Cook for 1-2 minutes each side, until golden. Mix together the soy and sugar, add to the wok and bubble until sticky. Remove from the heat.

method.Step 3: Heat the remaining oil in a large frying pan over a medium-high heat. Add the garlic and mushrooms and stir-fry for 1-2 minutes. Divide between plates, top with the beef and garnish with the spring onions to serve.
